articles.title: What The Batman Final Scene Means for Sequels - Den of Geek
articles.description: The final scene of The Batman teases big things to come in Gotham City. Director Matt Reeves tells us exactly what it means.
articles.content: That’s Barry Keoghan (recently seen doing superhero movie double duty as Druig in Marvel’s The Eternals) bringing Joker to life here. We hear him, but we don’t fully see him. And there’s a reason for… [+2896 chars]
